com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base
Interface HasPlacement

All Known Implementing Classes:
HoverBase, Popover, Tooltip
public interface HasPlacement

Interface for widgets that have a placement.

Since:
2.0.2.0
Author:
Dominik Mayer
See Also:
Placement
